backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, conversations, authorization checks, and blob-backed chat entries with strict permission gating.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend files and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating authentication, guest mode, conversations, chat UI, information retrieval, and voice features.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button with error handling, recovery logic, and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting newly authenticated users to save a display name with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input component handling text, voice dictation, photo attachments, and message submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatEmptySt: Displays initial chat screen with example prompts and capability hints.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Renders chat messages with auto-scroll, role indicators, optional voice actions, and special cooking-format parsing.
frontend/src/components/chat/types.ts: Defines chat-related types including Message, MessageMode, and photo attachments.
frontend/src/components/help/Capabilitie: Modal dialog listing SuperNova’s capabilities and limitations.
frontend/src/components/history/Conversa: Sidebar for listing, selecting, and creating conversations with optional data export and auth gating.
frontend/src/components/settings/VoiceSe: Dialog for choosing voice response mode with browser support warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversationHistor: Manages conversation list, active conversation selection, and saving new entries tied to the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/useInformationRetriev: Fetches and summarizes information from Wikipedia and DuckDuckGo, handling partial failures and cooking‑specific formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls for profiles, conversations, and entries with React Query, including mutations and cache invalidation.
Implements browser speech‑to‑text with start/stop controls, transcript accumulation, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Provides text‑to‑speech playback with control over speaking state, error reporting, and cleanup.
Stores and retrieves the user's preferred voice response mode using localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styling to body and prose elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/cooking.ts: Detects cooking-related prompts and formats cooking responses by extracting ingredients, steps, and tips from text snippets.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Creates and downloads a JSON file from provided data using a generated blob and timestamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/summarize.ts: Builds a short summary from text snippets by extracting the first few sentences or falling back to truncated content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography plugins, theme extensions, and animations based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and feature requirements focused on fixing login flow and enabling guest mode.
